struct.name: is_success

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['ex_packages']="[{"express":{"expressNo":"11111","expressId":1},"num":"1","weight":null},{"express":{"expressNo":"11112","expressId":2},"num":"1","weight":null}]"
params['oid']=1501090164178949003
params['request_id']="1496300283166195715"
params['tid']="E20190220114426088700008"
params['total_num']=2

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.trade.dc.delivery.ordersingleitemsend', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'[{"express":{"expressNo":"11111","expressId":1},"num":"1","weight":null},{"express":{"expressNo":"11112","expressId":2},"num":"1","weight":null}]', 'oid' => '1501090164178949003', 'request_id' => '1496300283166195715', 'tid' => 'E20190220114426088700008', 'total_num' => '2', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

errorCodes.errorDesc: 发货商品不合法, 无法发货
所发包裹的商品总数必须等于该商品的购买总数
订单只有在待发货的状态下才允许发货

name: ordersingleitemsend
scenarios: 单商品分为多个运单发货
